official_title: A bill to modify the Houston Ship Channel navigation project to maintain a forty-foot project depth in the Barbour Terminal Channel.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project at the Houston Ship Channel to maintain a forty-foot project depth in the Barbour Terminal Channel, Texas.
